title: Leadership
description: As a frontend lead, I prompt members to achieve technical goals. I also train and tutor new hires.

title: Aesthetic
description: With MA degree in Fine Arts and knowledge in UI UX, I am able to bring visual creation and frontend together.

title: Teamwork
description: With great communication and emotional security, we move forward smoothly.

title: Cross-Cultural
description: Working with team in Spain and customers all over the world, I respect and enjoy different cultures.

title: Agile
description: I promote the culture of progressive development and build work ethics to boost team performance.
